TopicTitle: KSP QA Team Submissions Are Now Closed

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/40de164a504d3599eb78fad11ea14e6d/tumblr_inline_nb37zkh6tF1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><span>We’d like to thank all of you who submitted applications to join our QA team. The process has now closed and those chosen for spots on the team have been contacted.<span class="Apple-converted-space">.</span></span><br/><br/><span>Many of you had great experience, so tough choices were made, but rest assured, the new faces chosen to join will help us feel less like RocketPilot573’s craft for 0.25 and beyond.</span></p>

Aw, dangit, I didn't get picked...

Anyway, congrats to those who were chosen! Good luck as testers, and make sure the game's as awesome as ever when the release comes out to us general guys!

Aw, dangit, I didn't get picked...

Anyway, congrats to those who were chosen! Good luck as testers, and make sure the game's as awesome as ever when the release comes out to us general guys!

Ditto.

What was the correct answer to "What is the airspeed velocity of an unlaiden swallow" question?

Edited September 2, 2014 by TechnicalK3rbal
I figure that it was a reference to Monty Python and the Holy Grail. I answered "African or European swallow?" Guess it wasn't right.

I figure that it was a reference to Monty Python and the Holy Grail. I answered "African or European swallow?" Guess it wasn't right.

I put a similar answer - "Is it an African swallow?.. Blue... NO! YELLOWWWWW!!!"

I was guaranteed that I was going to be chosen. In fact, I was contacted by a Nigerian businessman who claimed to represent Rowsdower. If I sent the businessman $1000, he would pass it Squad to ensure my spot on the QA team.

@Rowsdower: please return my $1000. thank you.

I demand a recount!!

Good luck to all the new testers!

Im just saying i installed a mod that messed up ksp so i uninstalled it but then i went to steam to reinstall it but now it wont go online what unfortunate ugh now i cant play ksp till steam works again and i dont want to buy it AGAIN that will be hard to get 40 dollers...why steam why?

Steam should go back online shortly, if not try manually changing it from offline to online somewhere in the top-left.
Very reported to the mods. Much hope to close.
Update: the QA recruitment drive from 2 years ago remains closed.
